name: Aging Room - Quattro Maduro (Formally F55M) - Concerto
additionalNotes: Aging Room is the top- rated boutique cigar brand in the world, consistently earning some of the highest ratings by Cigar Afficionado, thanks to top notch construction and superb taste throughout the entire line. First introduced by Rafael Nodal in 2011, the concept behind Aging Room was to create an exceptional line of boutique blends all rolled in small batches using the finest and rarest tobaccos all perfectly aged to perfection. Aging Room Quattro Maduro cigars keep the brands winning streak alive by showing off the darker side of Rafael Nodal. The blend is composed of the finest estate grown Dominican binder and long fillers covered by an oily and dark San Andrés Maduro wrapper, that all leads to flavors of chocolate, earth, black pepper, wood, and sweet cream.
